title: Titian watch face For Wear
summary: Smart and Elegant, for Android wear 2.0 - standalone compatible.
description: Titian watch face is build to extract maximum capabilities of Android wear 2.0 and make your daily life more productive and active.Titian watch face can changes the watch face color up to 16M color. it will never out of style.Titian watch face can operate in standalone mode. If you are iPhone user with Android wear 2.0, you don't have to struggle to access the customize feature like before.For Android wear 1.0 userThis watch face will provide Watch face you- A steps counter- Real-time watch battery - An agenda shortcutFor Android wear 2.0 userWe like to introduce Watch Face Complications for Android wear 2.0,A complication is any feature in a watch face that displays more than hours and minutes.it that can customize and serve you any information in our style. Titian watch face provide - Date- Time and Date- Clock world- Shortcut to your favorite contact- App shortcut- Notification count- Photo- Step count- Watch battery- Shortcut to agenda app- etc.it compatible with Android Wear watches:• Motorola Moto 360 • Motorola Moto 360 Gen 2• Motorola Moto 360 Sport• Asus ZenWatch• Asus ZenWatch 2• Huawei Watch• LG G Watch• LG G Watch R• LG Watch Urbane• LG watch sport• Samsung Gear Live• Sony SmartWatch 3• TAG Heuer Connect • Fossil Q FOUNDERAny suggestion or bug, feel free to send it to ammarptn@gmail.com
descriptionHTML:
Titian watch face is build to extract maximum capabilities of Android wear 2.0 and make your daily life more productive and active.

Titian watch face can changes the watch face color up to 16M color. it will never out of style.

Titian watch face can operate in standalone mode. If you are iPhone user with Android wear 2.0, you don't have to struggle to access the customize feature like before.

For Android wear 1.0 user
This watch face will provide Watch face you
- A steps counter
- Real-time watch battery
- An agenda shortcut

For Android wear 2.0 user
We like to introduce Watch Face Complications for Android wear 2.0,
A complication is any feature in a watch face that displays more than hours and minutes.it that can customize and serve you any information in our style. Titian watch face provide
- Date
- Time and Date
- Clock world
- Shortcut to your favorite contact
- App shortcut
- Notification count
- Photo
- Step count
- Watch battery
- Shortcut to agenda app
- etc.

it compatible with Android Wear watches:
• Motorola Moto 360
• Motorola Moto 360 Gen 2
• Motorola Moto 360 Sport
• Asus ZenWatch
• Asus ZenWatch 2
• Huawei Watch
• LG G Watch
• LG G Watch R
• LG Watch Urbane
• LG watch sport
• Samsung Gear Live
• Sony SmartWatch 3
• TAG Heuer Connect
• Fossil Q FOUNDER


Any suggestion or bug, feel free to send it to
ammarptn@gmail.com
recentChanges: Fixed the complication icon that didn't show correctly
